page.title: 15Kettle Produce
page.content: Kettle Produce was established in 1972 when C.Samson took over management and it provides employment for many people in the area.From 1926 until 1972 the farm grew sugar beet for the old sugar beet factory in Cupar.Between 1972 and 1975 Kettle Produce{supplied {vegetables}to a cooperative called {Fife-Grow,}then went private. The decision to specialise in vegetables was reached because a gap in the market existed. At the moment{300 people}are employed for picking,planting,packaging and distributing the vegetables.They {supply vegetables throughout Scotland {and also France,Belgium and Spain.
